name: Fear Fighter
description:
https://germanp.itch.io/ AKA EL#9909 - Programmer, Animator, Sound Designer

https://lemonade-sherbet.itch.io/ AKA Lemonade Sherbet#8314 - Pixel Artist, Narrative Writer, Dialogue Writer

I hope people enjoy it and all feedback is appreciated. The link to the game jam is below so you can check out the other games submitted. Everyone did an amazing job. https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8

When left alone at home, your fears creep up on you. But your parents and encouraging texts can help you fight them. It's time to survive your fears.

NOTE: The game was made in Unity and the Windows version is said to potentially work on Linux and macOS as well. However, this is untested so we aren't truly sure if it will.
